summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account for the month of October 2018. It details deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting significant transactions including large fund transfers. The document is marked confidential and is part of the Epstein case investigation.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Account Summary for October 2018
events.description: The document summarizes the account balance and transactions for the month, including significant fund transfers.

events.title: Funds Transfer
events.description: A funds transfer of $5,000,000.00 was made from the account.

events.title: Funds Transfer
events.description: A funds transfer of $10,000,000.00 was made from the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, 113 St, Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $522,690,279.36 as of October 1, 2018.
A total of $15,000,000.00 was transferred out of the account during October 2018.
The account earned $517,427.89 in interest for the month.
Service charges and fees totaled $50.00 for the statement period.
The document is marked confidential and is part of the Epstein case investigation.
